__e: I remember everything about that night, 'cause it's... not every day your life is threatened... then saved by a man in black.
I don't need saving from anyone, and if you're really as good as you say you are, then you can just wait in line and prove it like everyone else.
I'm tired of hearing women cry f or someone else to save them.
Describe to us, Mr Paynter, what took place the night of the gale.
If there is anything that you can salvage from it, I would really appreciate it.
The man who killed his only friend, who had to be saved from himself over and over?
